title: What was the thought process behind Xayah's ult
body:
I don't really understand it. 
It's not only a new troll pole, it's also a potential setup for substantial disruption and CC lock-down. 
Neither of which are particularly smart attributes to give a marksman. 
Can someone explain it to me? 
(And no, "unique" playstyle/design isn't a legitimate answer.)

replies.body:
Pretty much everything riot says in those is absolute BS.
Give me something logical to mull over.
Then go send in a ticket, hope you can get patched to a developer and cry to them how you hate going against X champion the same way others complain about other X champions
